extendedInfo.description: live wallpaper of glittery flowers and background that says "Happy Mothers Day"settings available for speed and sizessave to sd cardBy Downloading this app you will be agreeing to Opt-in to the ad networks below that will serve notification ads and an Icon ad. "This app contains ads that may appear in the notification tray or homescreen as an Icon.You can optout the ads from the links below:Airpush Optout: http://www.airpush.com/optoutLeadbolt Optout: http://opt.leadbolt.com/SendDroid Optout: http://senddroid.com/opt-out/To delete the icons just hold your finger on them and drag to the trash can to delete."
